name: Tanguy's News Reader
description: This extension applies a vintage aesthetic to your web browsing experience by grayscaling the entire tab, giving it a retro look. It also transforms all text on the page with an old-fashioned font, reminiscent of classic typewriters or print. Additionally, it adds a decorative frame around images, enhancing the nostalgic feel of the page. Ideal for those who enjoy a more timeless, classic web appearance.
